text: Tim Sale (May 1, 1956 - June 16, 2022) was an American comics artist. He was born in Ithaca, New York. He won the 1999 Eisner Award. He was known for his works with DC Comics and illustrated the comics Batman: The Long Halloween, Batman: Dark Victory and Superman For All Seasons. On June 13, 2022, Sale was hospitalized in Seattle, Washington under serious condition.Batman: The Long Halloween Artist Tim Sale Admitted To Hospital He died three days later from kidney failure at the age of 66. ==References== ==Other websites== *Tim Sale at Mike's Amazing World of Comics *Tim Sale at the Unofficial Handbook of Marvel Comics Creators *Tim Sale Interview at Batman-on-Film.com *Sale's KCRW Guest DJ Set Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:Artists from New York (state) Category:People from Ithaca, New York Category:People from Seattle Category:Deaths from renal failure
